title: gerkulesz
author: gerkulesz
content: full access to the account, phone and email changeableTwitter blue paid for a year.Excellent survivability through mobile apps.Price - $150https://twitter.com/KhanShobnomPayment BTC, ETHAgree to escrow.Buy on bot https://t.me/TwiTwiShopBot or text on telegram https://t.me/tw1supp

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: It's interesting that your account is 11 years old, has 10k+ followers and doesn't have a single tweet, just retweets. it is very difficult to determine the influence of this account and its real value if it has any.Also, the fact that the profile pictures are related to NFT is no guarantee that the followers are from the crypto niche.it would be much more authoritative if you released a few tweets, where the actual engagement and potential of your account will be seen. Otherwise, this account is only good for bounty spammers.good luck with your sale.
